overview: On either side is about the last moments spent with Cécile Reims, 91 years old at the time. In 2009, Matthieu Chatellier filmed Cécile Reims and Fred Dreux in their home at La Châtre.  In 2019, he came back to see Cécile. Since the death of her husband she lives on her own.  She doesn’t write or engrave anymore.
title: On Either Side
